name: MSSticker
desc: A sticker that can be sent as a new message or attached to an existing balloon in the Messages app’s  transcript.

items.name: init(contentsOfFileURL: URL, localizedDescription: String)
items.desc: Initializes a sticker with the contents of the URL and the localized description.

items.name: var imageFileURL: URL
items.desc: The file URL of the image displayed by the sticker.
